name: Shoo!
description:
Protect the crops as a scarecrow through 5 levels in this little fun game!

Controls:

AWSD

  • AWSD to move
  • Space to Dash
  • Mouse button to Shoo
  • E to Interact
  • R to Restart

ARROWS

  • Arrows to move
  • Z to Dash
  • X to Shoo
  • C to Interact
  • R to Restart

GAMEPAD

  • Left stick to move
  • South Button to Dash
  • West Button to Shoo
  • East Button to Interact
  • Start to Restart

Made in 42 hours for Ludum Dare 52 Compo submission - Theme Harvest
